name: Game the Jam 48
description:
This game was created for HHN2022 Game Jam. The whole process took around 42 hours.

Theme: Keep it alive

Description: 
Keep alive the dev's spirit!

 Your goal is to make a game for 48H GameJam by fully or partially completing 4 given tasks, while not allowing your character to give up. All tasks must be completed at least at 50% to win the game. If either the character's motivation or two other status parameters fall too low, the character will give up.

Controls:  

  • Left click - select
  • Mouse Wheel Sroll - zoom
  • Hold Mouse Wheel - pan
  • On the top left, you can pause, resume or speed up game-time with given controls.

Credits:

Game Design: Igor Kocahrovskyy,  Arthur Khoroshavin

Code & Music: Igor Kocharovskyy (aka tionard)

Art: Arthur Khoroshavin

Arthur Khoroshavin's itch:  https://happyrat113.itch.io/
